gurmukhi: ਅੰਤ ਕਾਲ ੲੇਕ ਘਰੀ ਨਿਗ੍ਹ ਕੈ ਸਤੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਧੰਨਿ ਧੰਨਿ ਕਹਤ ਹੈ ਸਕਲ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਜੀ
transliteration: Ant Kaal Ayk Gharee Nigrah Kai Satee Hoi , Dhanni Dhanni Kahat Hai Sakal Sansaar Jee ?
translation: Controlling her mind and with utmost determination, when a woman jumps into the pyre of her husband and self immolates herself, the whole world applauds her effort of being a loving and devoted wife.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਤ ਕਾਲ ੲੇਕ ਘਰੀ ਨਿਗ੍ਹ ਕੈ ਜੋਧਾ ਜੂਝੈ ੲਿਤ ੳੁਤ ਜਤ ਕਤ ਹੋਤ ਜੈ ਜੈ ਕਾਰ ਜੀ
transliteration: Ant Kaal Ayk Gharee Nigrah Kai Jodhaa Joojhai , It Out Jat Kat Hot Jai Jai Kaar Jee ?
translation: As a brave warrior lays down his life fighting for his noble cause determinedly till the end, he is applauded here, there and everywhere as a martyr.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਤ ਕਾਲ ੲੇਕ ਘਰੀ ਨਿਗ੍ਹ ਕੈ ਚੋਰੁ ਮਰੈ ਫਾਸੀ ਕੈ ਸੂਰੀ ਚਢਾੲੇ ਜਗ ਮੈ ਧਿਕਾਰ ਜੀ
transliteration: Ant Kaal Ayk Gharee Nigrah Kai Choru Marai , Dhaasee Kai Sooree Chaddhaaay Jag Mai Dhikaar Jee ?
translation: Contrary to this, as a thief determinedly makes up his mind to commit theft, if caught, he is jailed, hanged or punished, he is degraded and rebuked the world over

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਕੈ ਅਸਾਧ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਸੁਭਾਵ ਗਤਿ ਮਾਨਸ ਅੳੁਤਾਰ ਜੀ ||੭੦||
transliteration: Taisay Duramati Gurmati Kai Asaadh Saadha , Sangati Soubhaav Gati Maanas Aoutaar Jee ?70?
translation: Similarly one becomes bad and wicked with base wisdom whereas accepting and abiding by Guru's wisdom makes a person noble and virtuous. A human being makes his life a success or failure according to the company he keeps or his devotion to the holy congreg
